name: download_agent_file
description: Downloads the complete agent configuration from Letta and saves it as a .af (Agentfile) file. The .af format contains the complete agent configuration including all tools, memory blocks, sources and MCP servers. Useful for backups, migration or sharing agent configurations.

agent_id.description: The Letta agent ID (e.g. agent-651dd87e-7c62-4134-831f-d6d62c5ee4ca). If not provided, the current agent ID from the environment is used.

output_filename.description: Optional: Custom filename for the .af file. If not provided, the agent name is used (e.g. 'MyAgent.af').

save_path.description: Optional: Directory where the file should be saved. Default: Current directory.
